summary: A pair of teenage motorcycle gangs maintain an uneasy truce between each other in the not-too-distant future. When an evil corporation tries to take over their ruined city, the gangs must decide whether to fight their common enemy.
cast: John Stockwell|Darrell Larson|Rae Dawn Chong|James Earl Jones|Kim Cattrall|Don Keith Opper|Pamela Ludwig|Tony Plana|Kelly Stuart|Matt Goulish|Joanelle Romero|Norbert Weisser|Marcia Holley|Alan Marcus|Kane Hodder|Dean Devlin|John Diehl|Sean Vertigo|Catherine Harper|Danny De La Paz|Jennifer Balgobin|Charles Skouras III|Terri Robinson|Morgan Weisser|Robert Otting|Ola Butler|Derek Jewett|Robby Benson|Joseph J. Dawson|Steve Fuji|Eric Jewett|Gene LeBell|Bob Swain
